title: **TRADED** - WTTF Any T206 Cobb Variation, Offering PSA-6 Babe Ruth
author: GoBigRed

posts.post_title: **TRADED** - WTTF Any T206 Cobb Variation, Offering PSA-6 Babe Ruth
posts.post_content:
Would like to trade for any T206 Cobb variation, PSA or SGC only.

Offering my 1935 Goudey 4-in-1 Babe Ruth PSA-6 plus cash, up to $6,000.

Would also consider upgrading, via '35 RuthTrade/Cash,  my current T206 Green (PSA-3) or T206 Red (SGC-5.5) Cobbs.

See scans in my Flicker Album:

[URL="https://www.flickr.com/photos/knouse-albums/albums/72157715090069153"]https://www.flickr.com/photos/knouse-albums/albums/72157715090069153[/URL]

Please reply to my email:  arkansas2014@gmail.com

Steve
